info.name: Pocket Casts responsive
info.description: A simplified UI for PocketCasts when the window is narrow
info.additionalInfo:
I like to have the PocketCasts player at the side of my screen, but the normal web player does support narrow windows very well. This theme adds a simplified version of the UI when the window is < 800px wide, removing the side bars and unnecessary views from the podcast list and player.

This was made quickly and may be a little rough but I find it makes the web player more pleasant to use.

Changelog 2016-10-26
- Added styles for window widths below 500px and below 400px.
-- Below 500px: Remove episode dates to allow more room for podcast/episode titles
-- Below 400px: Also remove episode images and simplify player controls to show only play/pause and the seek bar.
